title: Welcome
text:
Welcome to My Academic Website
I’m a researcher in Demography, interested in Population dynamics, fertility and kinship.
You can find my CV, publications, and other work on this site.



PAA 2025

title: About Me
text:
I’m Dr. Marcus Immonen Hagley, a Postdoctoral researcher at Department of Demography at University of Vienna.
My research focuses on general demographic changes in the population. I’ve worked on a wide arrange of topics from the socioeconomic consequences of kin death (disertation), fertility (on-going), kinship structure and change(on-going), and population changes in voting behaviour.



Demographic change
Fertility
Kinship





PhD in Political and Social Science, European University Institute
MSc in Demography, Stockholm University
BSc in Advertisment and PR, Stockholm University
